Trade/Device Name(s): iQ®200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module (Addition of Synovial Fluid)
iQ®200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module
Submitter Information: Iris Diagnostics, a Division of IRIS International, Inc.
Analyte(s): Nucleated cells (WBC and others as a group)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): iQ®200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Particle imaging via high-speed flow microscopy
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the addition of synovial fluid cell count parameter to the iQ®200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module, expanding intended use for automated RBC and nucleated cell counting.
Indications for Use Summary: In-vitro diagnostic device for examination and counting of red blood cells and nucleated cells in cerebrospinal fluid, serous fluids, and synovial fluid by trained laboratory users.
